translation.en: ♪ Don't lie to me ♪
[reporter] Tonight, all roads lead to Turbine Hall…
translation.fr: Ce soir, toutes les routesmènent au Turbine Hall…

translation.en: [reporter] ...where Joburg's high-society will witness
translation.fr: où le gratin de Joburg pourra découvrir

translation.en: the reveal of the first "Face of Bhengu Beauty,"
voted for by the public online.
translation.fr: voté par le public en ligne.

translation.en: Mogul Don Bhengu is expected to make a speech about these new changes
translation.fr: Le mogul Don Bhengu fera un discoursau sujet de ces changements

translation.en: and the future of the Bhengu Beauty empire.
translation.fr: et de l'avenir de l'empire Bhengu Beauté.

translation.en: I don't care that the partners want equity.
translation.fr: Je me fiche que les associésveuillent des fonds.

translation.en: -Draw up the papers! -[glass clinks]
This expansion is happening on Don Bhengu's terms.
translation.fr: L'expansion se feraselon les termes de Don Bhengu.

translation.en: End of story.
Jesus!
I can talk to the Kenyans, Ngcolosi.
The last time I went to Nairobi they were putty in my hands.
translation.fr: La dernière fois à Nairobi,ils m'ont adorée.

translation.en: The new face of Bhengu must have mass appeal.
translation.fr: Le visage de Bhengudoit avoir de l'impact.

translation.en: [in Sotho] They won’t need equity to make money…
translation.fr: Ils n'auront pas besoin de fonds…

translation.en: [in English] Save that enthusiasm for telling the maid how to clean, Grace.
translation.fr: Garde cet enthousiasmepour la femme de ménage, Grace.

translation.en: [in Sotho] I know you’re natural-born rubbish, Thando.
[in English] Don't make it worse with your drinking.
Excuse me?
You had to be carried out at the minister's party.
translation.fr: On t'a portée à la soirée du ministre.

translation.en: [in Sotho] You disgraced our husband and the Bhengu name.
translation.fr: Tu fais honte à ton mariet au nom de Bhengu.

translation.en: [in English] Please, Grace, I was fine. You're the one that--
translation.fr: J'allais très bien. C'est toi qui…

translation.en: Don't make excuses for being low-class.
translation.fr: N'excuse pas ton manque de classe.

translation.en: Tonight is about dignity.
translation.fr: Ce soir, il s'agit de dignité.

translation.en: Have some.
-And smile. -Enough.
You know, I can't believe they've got us here handing out goodie bags to guests.
translation.fr: J'hallucine qu'on doive remettreles sacs cadeaux aux invités.

translation.en: I should be the face of Bhengu Beauty.
translation.fr: J'aurais dû êtrele visage de Bhengu Beauté.

translation.en: [woman] I know, right. This Zinhle girl isn't even a real model.
translation.fr: Oui. Cette Zinhlen'est même pas mannequin.

translation.en: And that's why you shouldn't allow the public to vote for the face of Bhengu.
translation.fr: C'est ce qui arrive quand le public choisit le visage de Bhengu.

translation.en: Imagine being able to live with the Bhengu's.
Getting your own car, getting to know Grace.
translation.fr: Avoir sa propre voiture,apprendre à connaître Grace.

translation.en: [gasps] Even chilling with Phila Bhengu.
-Now you see that? -Oh my gosh. That's a different story.
-Oh, he's so hot! -He's so hot!
Oh, my God.
[woman 2] I'll tell him you say hi.
Let's go.
Shit! I have to go.
You guys just order whatever you want to, it's on me.
translation.fr: Commandez ce que vous voulez, je paierai.

translation.en: Zinhle, where are you?
Oh my God, you're doing my job again.
It's just a little foundation, Sisi.
translation.fr: C'est juste un peu de fond de teint.

translation.en: My foundation, darling.
-But I like doing it. -That's okay, I'm fine with it.
translation.fr: - Mais j'aime le faire.- D'accord, ça me va.

translation.en: [reporter] Past faces of Bhengu Beauty have been supermodels, actresses, and celebrities.
translation.fr: Auparavant Bhengu Beauté était représentéepar des mannequins et des actrices.

translation.en: Bhengu Beauty faced harsh criticism
over their overly-edited images
encouraging unrealistic standards of beauty.
Some wonder if the choice to go with an unknown face
translation.fr: Certains se demandentsi le choix d'un visage inconnu

translation.en: signals real change at Bhengu Beauty
or is it simply lip service?
translation.fr: ou si c'est juste un coup de pub.

translation.en: But as we can see tonight,
even though the public was asked to vote for the face of Bhengu Beauty,
translation.fr: le public a votépour le visage de Bhengu Beauté,

translation.en: the only guests here are an elite bunch.
translation.fr: mais les invitésfont tous partie de l'élite.

translation.en: And now it seems Mr. Bhengu and his two wives have arrived.
translation.fr: Il semble que M. Bhenguet ses deux femmes arrivent.

translation.en: Mr. Bhengu?
-Mr. Bhengu? -Hey, Angela. [chuckles]
[in Xhosa] I told you Angela's not welcome at Bhengu events.
translation.fr: Je t'ai ditque je ne voulais pas d'Angela.

translation.en: [in English] She's a very powerful journalist, what she says goes. This is big.
translation.fr: Elle a beaucoup de pouvoiren tant que journaliste.

translation.en: So, Dad, what do you think?
[in Xhosa] Excellent job, my girl.
[in English] Don't stress!
[in Xhosa] Have some champagne and meet some nice girls.
translation.fr: Bois une coupe et trouve jolie fille.

translation.en: [in English] The walls could have been bigger.
translation.fr: Les murs auraient pu être plus épais.

translation.en: Of course, Grace.
You did great, Linda.
[man] This way for a photo.
Sorry I'm late.
Why do you insist on looking like a garden boy, Ndumiso?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu as toujours l'aird'un jardinier ?

translation.en: -Come on, Ma. -Smile.
[in Xhosa] We’re taking the family photo with or without Phila.
translation.fr: On prend une photo avec ou sans Phila.

translation.en: -[in English] Hi, fam. -[Don] You're late.
I made it with five minutes to spare.
Hi.
[in Xhosa] Let's do this.
[in English] Bhengu smile.
[Don] That's baby number what?
[Grace] Six.
[in Xhosa] Where’s your baby number one?
[in English] Mr. Bhengu, quick question, please.
translation.fr: M. Bhengu, une question, s'il vous plaît.

translation.en: Why ask the public to vote for the face of Bhengu Beauty
translation.fr: Pourquoi demander au publicde voter pour le visage de Bhengu Beauté

translation.en: but not have them at this event?
You sure your company's committed to the things you speak about?
translation.fr: Vous êtes sûr d'être aussi inclusifque vous le dites ?

translation.en: [in Xhosa] Reserve your questions until after the launch.
translation.fr: Gardez vos questionspour après le lancement.

translation.en: [in English] And then you can be the judge.
[in Xhosa] She's always asking unnecessary questions.
[Thando in English] This is stunning, Linda.
-[Ndu] Well done. -[Linda] Thanks!
[Phila] How much did this cost?
[Linda in Xhosa] No, don’t ask too many questions.
translation.fr: Ne pose pas trop de questions.

translation.en: [announcer] Ladies and gentlemen,
put your hands together for the CEO of Bhengu Beauty,
translation.fr: applaudissez le PDG de Bhengu Beauté,

translation.en: Mr. Don Bhengu!
If you told me 15 years ago that, uh…
translation.fr: Si on m'avait dit il y a 15 ans,

translation.en: Bhengu Beauty would become
one of the biggest beauty companies in the country,
translation.fr: l'une des compagniesles plus prospères du pays,

translation.en: soon Africa,
I would have told you,
"You are absolutely right!"
I built this company with my own bare hands.
No political connections,
no capital,
no help whatsoever.
But tonight…
tonight we are here to unveil the new face of Bhengu Beauty.
translation.fr: nous allons dévoilerle nouveau visage de Bhengu Beauté.

translation.en: I left the choice to a public vote because
I wanted to provide an opportunity to someone who reminds me of myself,
translation.fr: car je voulais donner une chanceà quelqu'un comme moi,

translation.en: before I became the Don Bhengu.
translation.fr: avant que je ne devienne le Don Bhengu.

translation.en: Someone without privilege,
someone unvarnished,
an underdog to represent us all.
Ladies and gentlemen…
ushering in a new dawn as the newest face of Bhengu Beauty,
translation.fr: marquant une nouvelle ère,le nouveau visage de Bhengu Beauté,

translation.en: Zinhle Manzini!
What the hell?
[in Sotho] Linda! Go fix it.
[in English] Now. Now. Go. Go.
Looks like Bhengu Beauty hasn't changed its colors after all.
translation.fr: Bhengu Beauté n'a pas tant changé que ça.

translation.en: I could get you something a little stronger if you like.
translation.fr: Je peux t'apporter un truc plus fort.

translation.en: [Don in Xhosa] What nonsense is this?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que c'est que ces histoires ?

translation.en: Now we look like fools.
[Grace] Let's take this home.
[Don] Damn it.
Everyone’s going to call us hypocrites.
[in English] Ndu, take Zinhle to the car.
-How did this-- -Why must I repeat myself. Just do it.
[in Xhosa] Did you mess this up? You too busy partying?
translation.fr: Tu as tout gâché ?Trop occupé à t'amuser ?

translation.en: [Phila in English] I didn't do this!
I specifically told the designers to not change her complexion.
translation.fr: J'avais dit aux stylistesde ne pas changer son teint.

translation.en: -Everything was perfect when I-- -Obviously not!
translation.fr: - Tout allait bien.- À l'évidence, non.

translation.en: We're trying to show we're not stuck in the past
translation.fr: On essaie de montrer qu'on a évolué

translation.en: -and what do-- -[Linda] I'll fix it!
I'll get to the bottom of this. Listen…
translation.fr: Je saurai ce qu'il s'est passé.

translation.en: [in Xhosa] I’m sorry.
I’m sorry.
[in English] Get Peter to bring the car.
translation.fr: Dis à Peter d'amener la voiture.

translation.en: [Don in Xhosa] This is a disaster.
The driver could have brought me.
[scoffs] No, I don't mind.
This is all going blow over
in like a day or two.
You'll see for yourself.
I don't know how anyone could be so negligent. You know?
Okay, let me.
It's okay. I can do it.
translation.fr: Ça va. Je peux le faire.

translation.en: Yeah. Okay.
I bet this has never happened to Naomi Campbell.
translation.fr: Ça n'a jamais dû arriver à Naomi Campbell.

translation.en: Oh no, actually it has. I once helped her out just like this.
translation.fr: Si, en fait.Une fois, je l'ai aidée comme ça.

translation.en: I'm joking. I've never met her. [laughs]
translation.fr: Je blague. Je ne l'ai jamais vue.

translation.en: Very funny.
Give me your hand.
There you go.
This…
-Of course. -For you.
Thank you.
You'll get your jacket tomorrow.
translation.fr: Je te rendrai ta veste demain.

translation.en: [Ndu] Sure.
[Don] Damn it.
Twitter is abuzz.
Ah, yeah, well, Linda will figure out what happened, and we will do what we do best.
translation.fr: Linda découvrira ce qui s'est passéet on fera ce qu'on fait de mieux.

translation.en: We will handle it.
Relax, old man.
[Thando] Actually, I'm going to my room.
No, you stay exactly where you are. I need everyone here.
translation.fr: Non, reste ici.J'ai besoin de tout le monde.

translation.en: [in Sotho] Regina, call Zinhle.
[in English] I need a double.
Thando will do it. You can see your favorite son is already doing it.
translation.fr: - Thando le fera.- Ton fils préféré le fait déjà.

translation.en: I'll have a Chardonnay.
What a fuck-up.
[in Zulu] Dad.
[in English] As I said, we will handle it.
translation.fr: comme je l'ai dit, on va gérer ça.

translation.en: My people are already tweeting in our favor.
translation.fr: Mes potes tweetent déjà en notre faveur.

translation.en: -[Thando] Do you want a drink? -Yeah.
There you are, Zinhle.
-[in Sotho] Any journalists called you? -No, Mam' Grace.
translation.fr: - Les médias t'ont contactée ?- Non, Mam' Grace.

translation.en: If they do, no comment. [in English] That goes for all of you.
translation.fr: Si c'est le cas, ne dis rien.Ça vaut pour vous tous.

translation.en: PR is coming over, and we're going to say it was a technical malfunction.
translation.fr: Les R.P. arrivent.On dira que c'était un problème technique.

translation.en: Get it?
End of story.
You can go.
Mam' Grace?
[Grace] Yes.
[in Sotho] Do you remember that I still need to go to my cousin's after-funeral cleansing?
translation.fr: Je dois aller à la purificationaprès les funérailles de mon cousin.

translation.en: [in English] Your cousin is not family, Zinhle.
translation.fr: Il n'est pas de la famille.

translation.en: The events company messed up the images. They can't explain what happened.
translation.fr: La boîte d'événementiel a foiréles images. Ils ignorent pourquoi.

translation.en: -[Grace] Linda, that's not good enough. -I know that, Grace.
translation.fr: Ça ne suffit pas. Je le sais.C'est pour ça que je les ai virés.

translation.en: Okay, that's why I fired them.
translation.fr: Je le sais.C'est pour ça que je les ai virés.

translation.en: -[Don] Good night. -Ahem. Good night.
Dad, is there anything I…
[Don] No, you've already done enough.
translation.fr: Tu en as déjà assez fait.

translation.en: Thando?
[in Sotho] What did I say to you
about your sulking in public?
translation.fr: de ne pas bouder en public.

translation.en: [in English] I'm so sorry.
Drink, Mom?
No thanks, and put that down. No more drinking for you.
translation.fr: Non merci, et pose ça. Arrête de boire.

translation.en: -Yes, definitely not. -You called?
[sighs] We need to talk.
[Zinhle] Your favorite.
-Really? -Mm-hmm.
[in Zulu] To be honest…
[in English] I should be getting you chocolates after the day you had.
translation.fr: Je devrais t'offrir des chocolatsaprès ta journée.

translation.en: [in Zulu] Are you okay?
[in English] It was weird seeing my face like that, as though it was bleached or something.
translation.fr: C'était bizarrede voir mon visage presque blanchi.

translation.en: [in Zulu] But I'm okay.
I'm sorry.
[in English] How much damage do you think this will do to Bhengu Beauty?
translation.fr: Combien de dégâtscela va-t-il faire à Bhengu ?

translation.en: [in Zulu] I don't know.
[in English] As you heard, PR statements are being made, woh, woh, woh, woh.
I wonder how long people will be talking about it.
translation.fr: Je me demande si ce sera vite oublié.

translation.en: What did I do to deserve these, really?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que j'ai fait pour mériter ça ?

translation.en: [in Zulu] I just wanted to thank you. [in English] For being my friend here for the past four weeks.
translation.fr: Je voulais te remercier.D'être mon amie depuis un mois.

translation.en: [in Zulu] You'll get used to this place.
[in English] Even the royal bitchness herself.
But, it's good to have a new friend around here.
translation.fr: C'est bon d'avoir une nouvelle amie.

translation.en: Oh, Don.
[in Sotho] Where are you off to?
[in English] Partners are freaked out after last night. I need to make a few calls.
translation.fr: Les associés ont flippé après hier soir.Je dois passer des coups de fil.

translation.en: [in Sotho] I'll ask Regina to bring some coffee to the study.
translation.fr: Je vais dire à Regina de te faire du café.

translation.en: [in English] I'm actually going to the office.
translation.fr: Je vais à la compagnie, en fait.

translation.en: [in Sotho] It's Saturday. I've arranged a relaxing spa treatment.
translation.fr: C'est samedi.J'ai prévu un soin relaxant au spa.

translation.en: [in English] I'll be back for dinner.
translation.fr: Je serai là pour le dîner.

translation.en: [Zinhle] How's everything with you?
[in Zulu] Yesterday you seemed like you were a little sad.
translation.fr: Hier, tu avais l'air un peu triste.

translation.en: [in English] You know what it's like with Grace.
translation.fr: Tu sais ce que c'est avec Grace.

translation.en: "Smile, dear, we're in public."
It's exhausting.
What's it like being a second wife?
translation.fr: Ça fait quoi d'être une seconde épouse ?

translation.en: I wouldn't recommend it,
but what I do recommend is some wine with these chocolates.
translation.fr: mais du vin avec ces chocolats, oui.

translation.en: Hmm? Stolen from Grace's collection, of course.
translation.fr: Volé dans la collection de Grace,bien sûr.

translation.en: [chuckles] It's not even midday yet. -[Thando] Really? -Mmm.
translation.fr: - Il n'est pas encore midi.- Ah oui ?

translation.en: But it is the weekend, right?
[woman] I'm coming.
Hi! I missed you so much.
I'll bet you did.
Of course.
Oh, babe, I heard about the launch.
translation.fr: Chéri, j'ai appris pour le lancement.

translation.en: Shh. I'm not here for that. No?
translation.fr: - Je ne suis pas là pour ça.- Non ?

translation.en: [Don] I've got something for you.
-You do? -Yes.
It's so beautiful! Thank you.
-[Don] Wait, babe… -Hmm?
[Don] Stop.
-What? -Call an ambulance.
What do you mean? What's going on?
-Stop… -Oh my God, what's wrong? Are you okay?
Call an ambulance.
[Ruby] Babe, what's wrong? Okay.
[in Sotho] I don't know.
Grace doesn't want me to go.
translation.fr: Grace ne veut pas que j'y aille.

translation.en: She took…
I have to go, I'll call you back.
translation.fr: Je dois y aller, je te rappelle.

translation.en: [in English] Does… Does Mam' Grace need me?
No, um…
Would you like to grab something to eat?
I figured you could use an escape.
Ah. Thanks, but I'm going to sleep early.
translation.fr: Merci, mais je vais me coucher tôt.

translation.en: Of course. Um… yeah, just shout if you need anything.
translation.fr: Bien sûr. Oui…Crie si tu as besoin de quelque chose.

translation.en: [in Sotho] That's the spot.
[in English] No, man.
Oh, Noni. Eish!
Yes?
Where is he?
[in Sotho] We're here for Don Benghu. Where is he?
translation.fr: On vient voir Don Bhengu. Où est-il ?

translation.en: -[in English] Is he okay? -With you in a second. [Linda] Please, just tell us.
translation.fr: - Il va bien ? Dites-nous.- Un moment…

translation.en: Hey! When I talk to you, you listen!
-Where's my husband? -Mama, she's gonna get to us.
translation.fr: - Où est mon mari ?- Elle va s'occuper de nous.

translation.en: Is there a doctor or someone we can talk to?
Mrs. Bhengu?
[in Sotho] What kind of service is this?
You're a private hospital and we're waiting in reception?
translation.fr: C'est un hôpital privéet on attend à la réception ?

translation.en: -[in English] Where's my husband? -[in Tswana] Sorry, ma'am. Come with me.
translation.fr: Où est mon mari ? Désolée. Venez avec moi.

translation.en: [in English] Just tell us if he's okay.
[in Zulu] Sis' Regina, where's everyone?
[in Xhosa] They're all at the hospital. Bab' Don had a heart attack.
translation.fr: Ils sont à l'hôpital. Bab' Don a fait un infarctus.

translation.en: -[in Tswana] He's in surgery right now. -[Linda in English] How long will it take?
translation.fr: Il est en salle d'opération. Ça sera long ?

translation.en: He has a history of coronary artery disease.
When can we talk to the doctor?
[in Tswana] I'll have more information after the surgery. [in English] Excuse me.
Okay guys, whoa. It's just a little scare, okay.
translation.fr: Bon. C'est juste une petite frayeur.

translation.en: Dad is still young.
This stays right here. We've had enough PR disasters already.
translation.fr: Ça reste entre nous.On a déjà eu assez de désastres en RP.

translation.en: [Ndu] Mama, who cares about PR? Dad just has a heart attack.
translation.fr: Qui se soucie de ça ?Papa vient de faire un infarctus.

translation.en: Ndumiso!
[in Sotho] We can't have people speculating.
translation.fr: On ne peut pas laisser les gens spéculer.

translation.en: Phila, find out who he was with at the office when this happened.
translation.fr: Trouve avec qui il étaitquand c'est arrivé.

translation.en: They can't talk.
[in English] Done.
[Grace in Sotho] Linda.
-[in English] What? -[Grace] It's all your fault.
[in Sotho] Your carelessness…
[in English] Are you fucking kidding, Grace Mama, come on, that's unfair.
Linda, she didn't mean that.
Of course I did.
[Grace in Sotho] What are you doing here?
Sis' Regina told me what had happened.
translation.fr: Regina m'a raconté ce qui s'était passé.

translation.en: [in English] I thought I'd bring some snacks.
I doubt anyone is hungry.
Thank you.
It's like you read my mind. I'm famished.
translation.fr: Tu lis dans mes pensées. Je meurs de faim.

translation.en: [Zinhle] How's Bab' Don? [Ndu] Um, still in surgery.
translation.fr: - Comment va Don ?- Il est en salle d'opération.

translation.en: What is it?
He wasn't in the office.
His driver insisted he was there.
translation.fr: Son chauffeur m'a dit que si.

translation.en: [Phila] They found him at the company penthouse.
translation.fr: Il était au penthouse de l'entreprise.

translation.en: Was he alone?
I don't know.
Hey, this looks good. Is this you?
translation.fr: Ça a l'air bon.C'est toi qui l'as apporté ?

translation.en: -It's the least I could do. -Thank you.
translation.fr: - C'est la moindre des choses.- Merci.

translation.en: You can go.
And don't you dare tell anyone about this.
translation.fr: et ne parle de ça à personne.

translation.en: Let me know if you need anything else.
translation.fr: N'hésitez pas si vous avez besoin.

translation.en: [Thando] Thanks.
Oh yeah, um… let me walk you out.
No, no, it's fine.
Stay with everyone. I'll be okay.
translation.fr: Reste avec les autres. Ça va aller.

translation.en: -Hey. -Coffee?
Thank you.
You know that…
[in Xhosa] my father…
[in English] I don't have any family.
[in Zulu] But that's not true.
[in English] Ndu and Phila, they have Grace, and…
translation.fr: Ndu et Phila ont Grace, et…

translation.en: -[Thando] But you've got me. -Yeah.
[Thando] No matter what, Grace cannot get rid of you.
translation.fr: Quoi qu'il arrive,Grace ne peut pas se débarrasser de toi.

translation.en: And you? [sniffs]
Well, it wouldn't be the worst thing, right?
translation.fr: Ce ne serait pas le pire, pas vrai ?

translation.en: [in Zulu] Your father is going to make it through.
Don't worry.
Shit.
[Thando] What?
Bhengu boys, your father's going to need a lot of support at the office.
translation.fr: Les garçons, votre père aura besoinde beaucoup de soutien au bureau.

translation.en: [in Xhosa] Ma, can we stop talking about business for a second? [in English] How are you? We could lose Dad.
translation.fr: On peut arrêter de parler affaires.Ça va, toi ? On pourrait perdre papa.

translation.en: Okay, hold on. We're not going to lose him.
translation.fr: Attends. On ne va pas le perdre.

translation.en: I mean… But he is right. Maybe we can cool it on the business talk.
translation.fr: Enfin… Mais il a raison. Évitons de parler affaires.

translation.en: Your father's going to need a successor sooner than later. [in Sotho] Think Linda's just "chilling" right now?
translation.fr: Votre père aura besoin d'un successeur.Vous croyez que Linda ne manigance rien ?

translation.en: [in English] If that happens, then he's going to choose me.
translation.fr: Si ça doit se faire, il me choisira.

translation.en: Someone leaked the news of Dad all over social media.
translation.fr: L'état de papaest sur les réseaux sociaux.

translation.en: -What? -They said he's dying.
translation.fr: - Quoi ?- Ils disent qu'il est mourant.

translation.en: What did I say to all of you?
[in Sotho] I said do not speak to the press!
translation.fr: De ne pas en informer la presse !

translation.en: Who was it?
[in English] Who said something, guys? Who?
translation.fr: Qui a dit quelque chose ? Qui ?

translation.en: [Linda] Maybe it's Zinhle.
-Did you say-- -She's always around, so it makes sense.
translation.fr: Elle est toujours là, donc c'est logique.

translation.en: Maybe someone heard us at reception.
Look, I will talk to the board, okay.
And we'll make sure that we…
[in Sotho] Can we see him? [in Tswana] Yes, you can. But he's still resting.
translation.fr: - On peut le voir ?- Oui. Mais il se repose.

translation.en: [in English] To help with recovery. So bear that in mind.
translation.fr: Pour aider à la guérison. Soyez brefs.

translation.en: Don?
[in Sotho] Don't you ever scare us like that again.
translation.fr: Ne nous fais plus jamais peur.

translation.en: [Linda in Xhosa] Dad, please hold on.
Please, I still need you.
[Grace] Linda.
[in English] Thank you.
Well, I know that you're gonna be out of here in a couple of days. So…
translation.fr: Je sais que tu seras sortidans quelques jours. Alors…

translation.en: [Ndu] Stay strong, Dad.
We love you.
Get well, Ngcolosi.
Excuse me, hi, did I not leave my phone here?
translation.fr: Excusez-moi,je n'ai pas oublié mon téléphone ?

translation.en: [Linda] This is a curse. [sighs] And this is my cue to go to bed.
translation.fr: - C'est une malédiction.- Et moi, je vais me coucher.

translation.en: Good night, everybody. Thank you.
If it isn't a curse, what is it?
First the launch… [in Xhosa] …and now Dad. This is a curse.
translation.fr: D'abord, le lancement,et maintenant, papa. C'est sûr.

translation.en: -[in English] It's not a curse. -Uh-huh. Thank you.
But it is an opportunity.
translation.fr: C'est une opportunité.On perd notre temps…

translation.en: -Guys, we've been wasting our time… -Ndumiso.
translation.fr: C'est une opportunité.On perd notre temps… - Ndumiso.Arrête avec tes sermons. Va te coucher.

translation.en: [in Sotho] It's not time for one of your sermons. Go to bed.
translation.fr: - Ndumiso.Arrête avec tes sermons. Va te coucher.

translation.en: Why are you up?
I was worried.
How is Bab' Don doing? [in English] That's not for you to worry about.
translation.fr: - Comment va Bab' Don ?- Tu n'as pas à t'inquiéter.

translation.en: [in Sotho] Go to sleep.
[Ndu in English] She's just trying to be nice, Mom.
Zinhle?
[in Sotho] Did you tell anyone about Don's heart attack?
translation.fr: Tu as parlé de la crise cardiaque de Don ?

translation.en: No, Mam' Grace. My phone's been off the whole night.
translation.fr: Non, Mam' Grace. Mon téléphone est éteint.

translation.en: [in English] Good.
Oh, that cleansing thing…
you can go.
[in Sotho] Thank you.
[in English] Some of these vultures.
[in Sotho] They wish their cards read "Rest in Peace."
translation.fr: Ils aimeraient que leurs cartessoient "Repose en paix".

translation.en: Goodness!
You'd swear I'm the one who had a heart attack.
translation.fr: On dirait que c'est moiqui ai fait un infarctus.

translation.en: Get rid of these flowers.
Justice… were you on duty when my husband had a heart attack?
translation.fr: Justice, étiez-vous de serviceau moment de l'infarctus ?

translation.en: Who was he with?
Yay-hey!
[in Sotho] Hey, bro.
-Yay! -[in English] I made it.
What up, though?
[in Sotho] I missed you.
I'm here now.
I thought I'd have to drag you back home. Hmm?
translation.fr: Je pensais devoir te traîner jusqu'ici.

translation.en: [in English] No. There's no need.
[in Sotho] Let's go inside. Makhosi Mnisi is waiting.
-[Zinhle] This feels so final. -Yeah.
[in Sotho] We have to stay strong for her.
translation.fr: On doit être forts pour elle.

translation.en: [Zinhle in Zulu] Greetings, Makhosi.
I still need to see other people. You're wasting my time.
translation.fr: J'ai des gens à voir.Ne me fais pas perdre mon temps.

translation.en: [Zinhle] I'm sorry. But I have a bottle of whiskey for you.
translation.fr: Je suis désolée.J'ai apporté une bouteille de whisky.

translation.en: Good girl.
Where's my whiskey?
Let's get to work.
[in Xhosa] Praise God.
When did you wake up?
I've been up for a while now.
How are you feeling?
[in English] I'm so fit, I could run a marathon.
[in Xhosa] I've brought someone to see you.
[in English] Who's that?
[in Xhosa] Goodness.
[in English] What a pleasant surprise.
[in Xhosa] I'm glad to see you awake.
translation.fr: Je suis contente de te voir réveillé.

translation.en: I brought a few traditional things. [in Zulu] These Western doctors also need help.
translation.fr: J'ai apporté des trucs traditionnels.La médecine occidentale a besoin d'aide.

translation.en: [in Xhosa] Now we are talking.
[Makhosi in Zulu] Ancestors of the Selepe family,
the Elders and Protectors of this family,
translation.fr: anciens et protecteurs de cette famille,

translation.en: I ask that you allow me as a healer
translation.fr: je vous demande de m'autoriseren tant que guérisseuse

translation.en: to cleanse these kids.
To cleanse them because there isn't an elder to do so.
translation.fr: À les purifier,car il n'y a pas d'aîné pour le faire.

translation.en: Please allow me to remove this dark cloud that follows them.
translation.fr: Permettez-moi d'ôterce nuage sombre qui les suit.

translation.en: And to remove these dark spirits that follow them.
translation.fr: Et d'ôter ces esprits sombresqui les suivent.

translation.en: Spirits that took their sister, Amahle.
translation.fr: Les espritsqui ont pris leur sœur, Amahle.

translation.en: Please allow me to do this so that their paths can be cleared.
translation.fr: Permettez-moi de le fairepour que leurs chemins soient dégagés.

translation.en: Makhosi!
[in Xhosa] It's strong.
Can you feel it?
I can feel it working already.
translation.fr: Je sens déjà que ça marche.

translation.en: -That's good. -[clears throat] -That's what we want to hear. -[chuckles]
translation.fr: C'est bien. C'est ce qu'on veut entendre.

translation.en: [in Sotho] I didn't know you called for Simphiwe [in Xhosa] I brought her, Grace.
translation.fr: - J'ignorais que tu l'avais appelée.- C'est moi, Grace.

translation.en: [in Sotho] Linda, you know your father's treatments can't…
translation.fr: Le traitement de ton père ne peut…

translation.en: [in English] I know what's good for me, Grace.
translation.fr: Je sais ce qui est bon pour moi, Grace.

translation.en: [in Xhosa] Thank you, my child. You can go.
translation.fr: Merci, mon enfant. Tu peux y aller.

translation.en: -[Linda] All right. -Simphiwe.
You've really helped me.
[in English] We should be more careful. [Don] Sit down.
What did the doctor say?
I said sit down.
There's going to be a few changes in our lives.
translation.fr: Il va y avoir des changementsdans nos vies.

translation.en: I need more children.
[Grace in Sotho] You know I can't have more kids. [in English] Another heart attack and I'm dead.
translation.fr: - Je ne peux plus en avoir.- Un autre infarctus et je suis mort.

translation.en: I don't have time to waste, so I'm taking another wife.
translation.fr: J'ai pas de temps à perdre,alors je prends une autre femme.

translation.en: I've already found someone who'll give me children.
translation.fr: J'ai trouvé quelqu'unqui me donnera des enfants.

translation.en: You can't make a decision like that without my permission!
translation.fr: Tu ne peux pas décider çasans mon accord !

translation.en: No, I don't need your permission.
translation.fr: J'ai pas besoin de ta permission.

translation.en: [in Sotho] I allowed my husband to marry you so he could have his entertainment at home.
translation.fr: J'ai laissé mon mari t'épouserpour qu'il se divertisse.

translation.en: Why is he looking elsewhere when you're here? [in English] What's that?
translation.fr: Pourquoi cherche-t-il ailleursquand tu es ici ? Hein ?

translation.en: Do you want to go and ask him yourself? [in Zulu] You heard what he said.
translation.fr: Tu veux aller lui demander ?Tu l'as entendu.

translation.en: He wants more children, and you and I both know I couldn't…
translation.fr: Il veut plus d'enfants,et on sait que je ne peux…

translation.en: [in English] Shut up! Thando, just shut up!
Smile, dear, we're in public.
[Ruby] Excuse me!
[in Zulu] Who are you?
[Grace in English] You know exactly who I am.
[in Zulu] Who are you?
I'm Ruby.
[in Sotho] Isn't that a whore's name?
translation.fr: C'est pas un nom de pute ?

translation.en: [in Zulu] No, it's my real name.
[in English] Test her.
Test me for what?
I'm not pregnant. Why would…
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas enceinte. Pourquoi…

translation.en: I'm calling security. No, you're not!
Your choice.
You want to do this sleeping or awake?
translation.fr: Tu veux être éveillée ou pas ?

translation.en: I'm not the bad guy here.
You're the one sleeping with my husband.
translation.fr: C'est toi qui couches avec mon mari.

translation.en: We can do this painlessly if you want.
translation.fr: On peut le faire sans douleur…

translation.en: Good girl.
Now go with the lovely nurse.
[in Sotho] Why are you laughing?
-Nana? -[groans]
[in Sotho] Are you okay?
I'm fine.
For Chancer.
For helping me win the online competition and the pictures at the launch.
translation.fr: Pour m'avoir aidée à gagner le concourset pour les photos du lancement.

translation.en: No problem.
How're you coping?
How are you coping?
You're all alone here now.
I'm fine.
I don't have to see Grace and Don every day.
translation.fr: Je ne vois pasGrace et Don tous les jours.

translation.en: I managed to get into Don's room at the hospital.
translation.fr: J'ai réussi à entrerdans la chambre de Don à l'hôpital.

translation.en: He looked so weak.
He looked nothing like the scary man from our childhood.
translation.fr: Il ne ressemblait en rienà l'homme effrayant de notre enfance.

translation.en: I wanted to finish him off.
You're not a murderer.
I know.
He has to live…
so that he sees us destroy everything that he loves.
translation.fr: pour qu'il nous voiedétruire tout ce qu'il aime.

translation.en: I know it's only been six months since we lost Amahle.
translation.fr: Je sais que ça ne fait que six moisqu'on a perdu Amahle.

translation.en: If you need time…
-Time? -If you want to back out…
No!
I don't need time. This has to be done.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas besoin de temps.Il faut le faire.

translation.en: Did you get what I asked for?
translation.fr: Tu as ce que j'avais demandé ?

translation.en: I did, but you don't need it.
translation.fr: Oui, mais tu n'en as pas besoin.

translation.en: I do.
[in English] Just in case things go wrong.
translation.fr: Au cas où ça tourne mal.

translation.en: [in Sotho] Thank you.
[in English] For doing this with me.
[in Sotho] We're in this together.
[in Zulu] He say he'll marry you?
Yes.
How old are you?
[in English] Twenty-two, 23, 24--
Twenty-one.
Twenty what?
-Twenty-one. -Twenty-one?
translation.fr: - Vingt et un.- Vingt et un ?

translation.en: You're a baby.
If you marry him, you're going to be wife number three. Last on the list.
translation.fr: Si tu l'épouses, tu serasla troisième femme. Dernière sur la liste.

translation.en: [in Zulu] He'll get you pregnant as soon as he can.
translation.fr: Il te mettra enceinte dès que possible.

translation.en: [in English] That doesn't mean he'll stop sleeping with other girls.
translation.fr: Il continuera de coucher avec d'autres.

translation.en: [in Zulu] There are lots of Rubys.
translation.fr: Il y a un tas de Ruby.

translation.en: By the time you turn 23…
[in English] You'll feel trapped. You know why?
translation.fr: tu te sentiras piégée. Tu sais pourquoi ?

translation.en: [in Zulu] Because the Bhengu name will not be tainted by divorce.
translation.fr: Car que le nom de Bhengune sera pas entaché par le divorce.

translation.en: Goodness.
[in English] Negative.
Perfect.
Now,
if you don't want to suffer for the rest of your life,
translation.fr: si tu ne veux pas souffrir toute ta vie,

translation.en: you'll say and do exactly what I tell you.
translation.fr: tu diras et ferasexactement ce que je te dis.

translation.en: [in Zulu] Understood?
[in Xhosa] You're back.
[in English] Is Mam' Grace around? I wanted to tell her that I'm back.
translation.fr: Mam' Grace est là ?Je voulais lui dire que j'étais rentrée.

translation.en: [in Xhosa] She's not here.
[in English] Join me for dinner. Otherwise, all that food will go to waste,
translation.fr: Dîne avec moi. Sinon, toute cette nourriture sera gâchée.

translation.en: and Regina was expecting everyone to be here.
translation.fr: Regina pensait qu'on serait tous là.

translation.en: Come. Come sit down.
Um, so, how was the cleansing?
As good as these things get.
-Do you mind me asking why-- -How's your Dad?
translation.fr: - Pourquoi tu…- Comment va ton père ?

translation.en: Oh, he's coming back tomorrow.
He's awake?
[chuckles] Yeah. Actually, he's doing well.
translation.fr: Oui. En fait, il va bien.

translation.en: [Zinhle] Who took these?
[Ndu] Oh, I did, in art school.
[Zinhle] They're really good.
Yeah. I'm actually looking for something that I can print out and frame
translation.fr: Oui. Je cherche quelque choseà imprimer et à encadrer

translation.en: for Dad as a welcome-home gift.
translation.fr: pour papa en cadeau de bienvenue.

translation.en: -Uh… [laughs] -[in Zulu] Is this you?
[Ndu in English] Yeah. Um, that's from two years ago. When I used to copy everything Phila used to do,
translation.fr: Ça date d'il y a deux ans.Quand je copiais tout ce que Phila faisait

translation.en: before the accident. What accident?
Check this out.
I crashed my Porsche.
They had to cut me out. It took two months to recover.
translation.fr: Ils ont dû m'entailler.J'ai mis deux mois à m'en remettre.

translation.en: I remember thinking to myself,
translation.fr: Je me souviens m'être ditque j'aurais pu mourir

translation.en: I could have died without living a meaningful life.
translation.fr: Je me souviens m'être ditque j'aurais pu mourir sans avoir une vie utile.

translation.en: Now I spend my time looking for the deeper meaning in life, you know.
translation.fr: Depuis, je passe mon tempsà chercher le sens profond de la vie.

translation.en: [chuckles] Still looking.
I have to go.
Sorry, I'm actually not that hungry.
Ruby?
I'm home.
What the hell is this?
What's this?
I'm leaving, Don. I can't do this anymore.
translation.fr: Je m'en vais, Don.Je ne peux plus faire ça.

translation.en: What are you talking about?
-Come here. -No.
This repulsive relationship is over.
Repulsive?
You're old enough to be my father,
and I deserve way more than an arrangement.
translation.fr: et je mérite bien plus qu'un arrangement.

translation.en: [Don] An arrangement?
I want to marry you, start a family.
translation.fr: Je veux t'épouser, fonder une famille.

translation.en: You already have a family.
Please don't… don't go.
translation.fr: S'il te plaît, ne pars pas.

translation.en: I'm sorry I have to go,
and please delete my number.
[in Sotho] Cut them into smaller pieces.
We don't want him to choke after surviving a heart attack.
translation.fr: On ne veut pas qu'il s'étouffeaprès avoir survécu à un infarctus.

translation.en: [in English] Speaking of, are we picking him up?
translation.fr: En parlant de ça, on va le chercher ?

translation.en: [in Sotho] No, he said his driver will bring him back.
Morning, Mam' Grace. Phila. Regina.
[in English] Zinhle. Looking good.
[in Sotho] Thank you for letting me go to the cleansing yesterday.
translation.fr: Merci de m'avoir laisséaller à la purification hier.

translation.en: [in English] Nice hair.
[in Sotho] The styles I arranged… you've switched them up, huh?
translation.fr: Les styles que j'ai arrangés,tu les as changés ?

translation.en: I like the outfit too. Turn around so I can see.
translation.fr: J'aime la tenue. Tourne-toi, que je voie.

translation.en: Take a selfie and send it to Sonto in social media.
translation.fr: Prends un selfie et envoie-leà Sonto aux réseaux sociaux.

translation.en: [in English] And touch up your make-up. You're sweating.
translation.fr: Et retouche ton maquillage, tu transpires.

translation.en: I'll do that.
[in Sotho] You know, in my day…
you had to be taller and lighter…
translation.fr: il fallait être grande et fine

translation.en: to be considered beautiful.
[Phila in English] You can't just say things like that.
translation.fr: Ne dis pas des choses comme ça.

translation.en: [Grace] I'm just saying.
[in Sotho] When she won the competition, I was this close to denying the results.
translation.fr: que quand elle a gagné le concours,j'ai failli nier les résultats.

translation.en: [Phila in English] Yeah, she's not your typical model,
translation.fr: Oui, ce n'est pas un modèle typique,

translation.en: but she is beautiful and she is likable.
translation.fr: mais elle est belle et sympathique.

translation.en: You're right.
There's something recognizable about her.
[Phila] Yeah?
[in Sotho] Give me the knife. Let me show you.
translation.fr: Donne-moi le couteau. Je vais te montrer.

translation.en: Like this.
[in English] You can let go, Nana.
[in Sotho] They will pay.
I'll make sure of it.
[sniffling] Amahle. Amahle. Amahle!
